p: Statistical analysis was performed by comparing control group (noninfected mice) to infected mice or LD0 to LD100, respectively. Data were analyzed using the unpaired Student's t-test for data with two groups and ANOVA followed by Tukey's post hoc test was performed for data with â‰¥2 groups. P-values <0.05 were considered to be significant. Statistical analysis was performed using GraphPad Prism software ( https://goodcalculators.com/one-way-anova-calculator/ and http://www.graphpad.com/quickcalcs/ttest1.cfm).
